results.title: Unusual glycogenic hepatopathy causing abnormal liver enzymes in a morbidly obese adolescent with well-controlled type 2 diabetes: resolved after A1c was normalized by metformin.
results.text_hl: Unusual @<m>DISEASE_Spinocerebellar_Ataxias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020754 @@@glycogenic hepatopathy@@@ causing @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@abnormal liver enzymes@@@ in a morbidly @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ adolescent with well-controlled @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@: resolved after A1c was normalized by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
